name: Hip Hop Werewolf Explosion
description:
In this game, you play as a boy kidnapped by werewolves. If you don't want to become a werewolf yourself, there is only one solution : win a Hip hop battle !

Grab your controller and use your joysticks to make numerous different Hip Hop poses in rythm ! How long will you be able to dance against the werewolves ? 

This game must be played with a controller and does not launch without a controller plugged in. It has been made for the Game Dev Party #10 Game Jam, with LibGDX. In order to play the game, you must have Java installed on your computer.
